Title: Relates to allowing for three forty-five day extensions of necessary and available emergency shelter for victims of domestic violence
Summary: Allows for three forty-five day extensions of necessary and available emergency shelter for victims of domestic violence instead of the current two forty-five day extensions.
LawCode: Amd ยง459-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to allowing for three forty-five day extensions of necessary and available emergency shelter for victims of domestic violence
